channel.title: Hiking on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hiking on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Penguin Hiking
item.description: A penguin went hiking one day, Climbing mountains so far away, With flippers for boots, And ice in its roots, A chilly adventure’s display.

item.title: Raccoon Hiking
item.description: A raccoon set off for a hike, With a backpack and walking stick-like, Through forests it strolled, With snacks to unfold, Its trail mix, a balanced delight.

item.title: Robot Hiking
item.description: A robot went hiking, how strange, Its circuits and gears to arrange, It climbed and it trekked, No energy checked, A battery-powered exchange.
